card.name: Euru%3DBucca, Antique Dragon Ruins
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Treasure Map
card.text: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a nature creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Mafariich Tank
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ This creature can't attack if you don't have other creatures in the battle zone that have power 12000 or more.

card.name: Bontobo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a creature that has power 12000 or more, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Totenton
card.text: ■ Whenever you put a creature that has power 12000 or more into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Jumbo Rapadise
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add all creatures that have power 12000 or more from among them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Xenoxemitsu
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Kinokoala
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less into their owners' mana zone.

card.name: Kolencoco Tank
card.text: ■ Guardman ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put any number of creatures that have power 12000 or more into your hand, and the rest into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Tarutahoru
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal a creature that has power 12000 or more from your hand. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Ichigotchi Tank/Let's Goichigo
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ========================= ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
